english: Large maps which must be unfolded are unwieldy to use in the field .
chinese: 不能折叠的大型图纸在野外使用是很不方便的。

english: A tabulation of a function of two variables is cumbersome, but possible .
chinese: 二元函数的列表法是不方便的，然而是可能的。

english: Elastic members of simple shape offer greater potential for stability than those that are unwieldily flimsy, or asymmetrical .
chinese: 简单形状的弹性构件要比不方便的，薄壁的或不对称的构件提供较大可能的稳定性。
不方便的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Donated food can be used for projects only if it is distributed through cumbersome channels such as direct feeding or food-for-work programs .
chinese: 赠送的粮食如用于项目，必须通过诸如直接供给或者以粮抵工规化等一些不方便的渠道进行分配。

english: Do you have any difficulties because of the pain
chinese: 因为这痛使你有什么不方便的地方吗

english: He always visits me at an awkward time
chinese: 他老是在我不方便的时候来访。

english: The better - paying jobs were in hard - to - reach suburbs
chinese: 待遇比较好的工作则在交通不方便的郊区。

english: The lack of decent public transport is a great disadvantage
chinese: 没有适当的公共交通工具是很不方便的

english: The lack of decent public transport is a great disadvantage
chinese: 没有适当的公共交通工具是很不方便的

english: It is the traffic congestion that causes the inconvenience in beijing
chinese: 北京不方便的地方在于它交通拥挤。

english: They have no roots , and that makes their life very difficult .
chinese: 他们没有根，这对他们来说是很不方便的。 ”

english: Was he the only passenger who came on board at that untimely hour
chinese: 在那个不方便的时刻上船的只有他一个人么？ ”

english: We still feel sorry for the trouble that has caused you much inconvenience
chinese: 我们仍然很抱歉对您造成这么多不方便的困扰。
